name: Close Proximity
description:
GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

Close Proximity places you in command of a failing ship which is transporting humanity’s last hope, a cure to the plague that has been devastating humans for years. As your ship fails, and your crew races to fix it, you might have to make sacrifices so that the ship will make it home. You must make it home, humanity’s survival depends on it.

Features

  • Independant AI
    • The crew members aren’t just robots waiting to do your bidding. They have a mind of their own and will find something to do if you don’t give them any orders.
  • Hardcore gameplay
    • Death is permanent, if you lose someone then they are gone forever. So take care of your crew members. It can get lonely out there in space.
  • Unique runs
    • Everytime you play you will receive different crew members. Each with their own skills and personalities.

Controls:
Left Mouse Button: Select Crew Member / Room
Right Mouse Button: Order selected crew member to room
Escape: Open menu
Spacebar: Pause/Unpause the game

Still In Progress:
